translations: 受雇为汽车司机（chauffeur 的过去式）

sentences.sentence: He was chauffeured to all his meetings.
sentences.translation: 他由司机开车送去参加所有的会议。

sentences.sentence: He chauffeured my car for years.
The finest Manhattan chefs were chauffeured uptown to give her private cooking classes.
sentences.translation: 司机接来曼哈顿最好的厨师，在家里给她上厨艺课。
